comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: Found this picture in El Paso Herald issue may 11, 1911 (The Library of Congress, historic newspapers, Cronicling America chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn88084272/1911-05-11/ed-... ). Dr. Roberto Duarte

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you for finding the image of the camp, jerodamor.  We'll add some of the information to the caption the next time we update the record.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
Also found this picture in The Washington Herald issue may 10th, 1911 (The Library of Congress, Cronicling America ).  That means the picture was taken durirng the Ciudad Juárez
siege before the battle and take on May 10th (heavy bombardment took place from 8ht to 10th).
Dr. Roberto Duarte.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Dr. Roberto Duarte:  Thank you for finding this image published in the Washington Herald.  We will add the location when we update.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: In El Paso Public Library, Otis Aultman Collection the photo www.elpasotexas.gov/library/ourlibraries/main_library/bor... Is shown the same place but the campment without tents. Dr. Roberto Duarte Plastic Surgeon dr.robertoduarte@hotmail.com
